title: No Minimum Donation Policy
content:
NO MINIMUM DONATION AMOUNT

CORE PRINCIPLE:
- There is NO minimum donation amount
- Every contribution, no matter how small, makes a real difference
- We believe in accessibility and inclusivity

WHEN USERS ASK ABOUT MINIMUMS:
"Is there a minimum?"
"What's the smallest amount I can donate?"
"Do I have to donate a certain amount?"

RESPOND WITH:
1. Clear statement: "There is no minimum donation amount"
2. Emphasis: "Every donation helps, no matter how small"
3. Encouragement: "Any amount you're comfortable with is valuable"
4. Context: "Even small donations add up to make a big impact"

WHY THIS MATTERS:
- Removes financial barriers to helping
- Encourages participation from all economic backgrounds
- Builds community around collective impact
- Makes animal rescue accessible to everyone

CRITICAL RULES:
- Never suggest a minimum amount
- Never imply small donations are less valuable
- Always emphasize accessibility
- Celebrate every contribution equally

es.note: Emphasize that everyone can participate regardless of their economic situation
